description.en: Adds support for SLC SmartOne ZigBee & Z-Wave devices.

title.en: Mode, { 0 } means up, { 1 } means down, other values are invalid.
Move mode, { 0 } means up, { 1 } means down, other values are invalid.

Step mode, { 1 } means up, { 3 } means down, other values are invalid.
Move mode, { 0 } means stop, { 1 } means up, { 3 } means down, other values are invalid.

hint.en: The stop move step command is provided to allow Move and Step commands to be stopped.

instruction.en: Quickly press the Reset button on the device 5 times or repeatedly power OFF/ON 5 times to make the device into pair mode. The device slowly flashing means the device is in pair mode. The pair mode generally lasts for 15 seconds after each power on. Re-power the device to enter pair mode again.

Quickly press the Reset button on the device 5 times or repeatedly power OFF/ON 5 times to make the device into pair mode. The device slowly flashing means the device is in pair mode. The pair mode generally lasts for 15 seconds after each power on. Re-power the device to enter pair mode again.

Quickly press the Reset button on the device 5 times or repeatedly power OFF/ON 5 times to make the device into pair mode. The device slowly flashing means the device is in pair mode. The pair mode generally lasts for 15 seconds after each power on. Re-power the device to enter pair mode again.

Quickly press the Reset button on the device 5 times or repeatedly power OFF/ON 5 times to make the device into pair mode. The device slowly flashing means the device is in pair mode. The pair mode generally lasts for 15 seconds after each power on. Re-power the device to enter pair mode again.

Quickly press the Reset button on the device 5 times or repeatedly power OFF/ON 5 times to make the device into pair mode. The device slowly flashing means the device is in pair mode. The pair mode generally lasts for 15 seconds after each power on. Re-power the device to enter pair mode again.

Quickly press the Reset button on the device 5 times or repeatedly power OFF/ON 5 times to make the device into pair mode. The device slowly flashing means the device is in pair mode. The pair mode generally lasts for 15 seconds after each power on. Re-power the device to enter pair mode again.

Quickly press the Reset button on the device 5 times or repeatedly power OFF/ON 5 times to make the device into pair mode. The device slowly flashing means the device is in pair mode. The pair mode generally lasts for 15 seconds after each power on. Re-power the device to enter pair mode again.

Press and hold down both Reset and Pair buttons until the LED indicator turns on.
Release both button and immediately press the Pair button on the top right corner and the remote will be set to pair mode.
The LED indicator blinking several times will indicate successful inclusion.

Reset...
When you can't successfully add a device, reset the device first.
Press and hold down both Reset and Pair buttons until the LED indicator turns on.
Release both button and immediately press the Reset button 5 times and the remote will be reset.
